titles: This gallant caualiero Dicke Bovvyer newly acted.
publisher: Printed by Simon Stafford for Nathaniel Butter, and are to be sold at his shop in Paules Church-yard, neere S. Austens gate,
notes: Either a reissue with cancel title page or else a title variant of "The history of the tryall of chevalry"--the evidence of existing copies is inconclusive.
Running title reads: The history of the tryall of cheualry.
Identified as STC 24935b on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Cropped and inlaid; A2-4 in photostat from a Bodleian copy.
